sizing.rationale: Parallel read-only research slices to improve coverage.

ssot.goal: Run two independent research slices in parallel and return evidence-rich summaries.
constraints: spec phase must complete before quality phase
Role-scoped spawn allowlist: Director -> auditor/orchestrator; Orchestrator -> operator/coder_spark/coder_codex; Auditor and leaf roles spawn none.
No same-level spawns: Director does not spawn peers or leaf agents; Orchestrator does not spawn director/auditor/orchestrator.
Continuity gate: for this ssot_id, keep the same Auditor+Orchestrator pairing for the entire run.
acceptance_criteria: All payloads validate against packaged schemas
Ownership scopes are disjoint across slices
decisions: Use windowed functions.wait dispatch with ownership_lock
Continuity gate: If blocked, rework by dispatching additional leaf slices under the same ssot_id Auditor+Orchestrator pair without replacing either role.

subtasks.deliverable: Parallel research result summaries with evidence.
